resources.string: I am worthy of getting what I want.
I will accept the mysteries in life.
Other people love me for who I am.
I already have everything I need.
People treat me with the respect I deserve.
I can accept that everything should be as it is.
Everything I need is already within me.
I am comfortable speaking my mind.
I appreciate everything I have in life.
I appreciate everything I have in life.
I will learn from the lessons life gives me.
